sentences.eng: Listen to me.
It’s time to think about future.
I am 95.
You are 90.
Our children are in America.
Our grandchildren are in Great Britain.
Our great-grandchildren live in Australia.
But we live in Tver.
It's unfair!
It’s very cold in Tver in winter
and it’s very hot in summer.
It’s too far from Tver to the ocean.
sentences.rus: От Твери до [океана|океан|an ocean]  [слишком  далеко|слишком  далеко|too far].

sentences.eng: There is no Disneyland in Tver
and it’s hard to live without entertainment at our age.
It’s dangerous to go for a walk in Tver at night
sentences.rus: В Твери [опасно|опасно|it is dangerous] [гулять|гулять|to go for a walk] по ночам,

sentences.eng: because there are lots of homeless cats in the streets
sentences.rus: [потому что|потому что|because] на [улицах|улица|a street] кучи [бездомных|бездомный|homeless] кошек

sentences.eng: and there are no policemen.
I want to move to Australia.
sentences.rus: Я [хочу|хотеть|to want] [переехать|переезжать, перемещать(ся)|to move] в Австралию.

sentences.eng: It’s always warm there.
There are lots of policemen on the beach,
so nobody disturbs you.
It’s not expensive to live in Australia.
It’s easy to find the right company for scuba-diving there.
sentences.rus: [Там|там|there] [легко|легко|easy] [найти|найти, находить|to find] [подходящую|правильный, подходящий|right] [компанию|компания|a company] для [подводного плавания|подводное плавание с аквалангом|scuba-diving].

sentences.eng: To my mind, it’s time to take the final decision
and to move to Australia.
